00001 #include <unistd.h>
00002 #include <cstdio>
00003 extern "C" {
00004 #include <libnet.h>
00005 }
00006 #include <sys/poll.h>
00007 #include "config.h"
00008 #include "util.h"
00009 #include "raw_ethernet_packet.h"
00010 #include "error.h"
00011 #include "ethernet.h"
00012 
00013 //
00014 // Set to 1 if libnet 1.1 is being used
00015 //
00016 #define LIBNET11 1
00017 
00018 /*
00019    Accept incoming packets from stdin, write them to the wire and
00020    then signal back the parent that the write is done
00021 */
00022 
00023 using std::cout;
00024 using std::cerr;
00025 using std::endl;
00026 
00027 char errbuf[LIBNET_ERRORBUF_SIZE];
00028 
00029 #if LIBNET11
00030 libnet_t *interface;
00031 #else
00032 struct libnet_link_int *interface;
00033 #endif
00034 
00035 void usage()
00036 {
00037   fprintf(stderr, "writer device buffersize\n");
00038 }
00039 
00040 char *device;
00041 
00042 std::deque<RawEthernetPacket> buffer;
00043 
00044 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00045 {
00046   RawEthernetPacket p;
00047   int nin,nout;
00048   int one;
00049   int fail=ETHERNET_SERVICE_DMA_FAIL;
00050   int ok = ETHERNET_SERVICE_DMA_DONE;
00051 
00052   one=1;
00053 
00054   if (argc!=3) {
00055     usage();
00056     return -1;
00057   }
00058 
00059   device=argv[1];
00060 
00061 #if LIBNET11
00062   interface=libnet_init(LIBNET_LINK_ADV,device,errbuf);
00063 #else
00064   interface=libnet_open_link_interface(device,errbuf);
00065 #endif
00066 
00067   if (interface==NULL) {
00068     fprintf(stderr,"Can't open interface - %s\n",errbuf);
00069     exit(-1);
00070   }
00071 
00072   if (ioctl(fileno(stdin),FIONBIO, &one)) {
00073     fprintf(stderr,"Can't set nonblocking I/O\n");
00074     exit(-1);
00075   }
00076 
00077   nin=nout=0;
00078 
00079   while (1) {
00080 #if 1
00081     if (buffer.empty()) {
00082       WaitForRead(fileno(stdin));
00083     }
00084     if (CanReadNow(fileno(stdin))) {
00085       RawEthernetPacket p;
00086       p.Unserialize(fileno(stdin));
00087       cerr << "writer: newpacket "<<nin<<": " << p << "\n";
00088       buffer.push_back(p);
00089       nin++;
00090     } else {
00091       if (buffer.empty()) {
00092         continue;
00093       }
00094     }
00095 
00096     p = buffer.front();
00097     buffer.pop_front();
00098 
00099     memset(&(p.data[p.size]),0,ETHERNET_PACKET_LEN-p.size);
00100     p.size=MAX(p.size,(size_t)(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN+ETHERNET_DATA_MIN));
00101 
00102     Packet cp(p);
00103     cp.ExtractHeaderFromPayload<EthernetHeader>(ETHERNET_HEADER_LEN);
00104     EthernetHeader eh=cp.FindHeader(Headers::EthernetHeader);
00105     EthernetAddr ea;
00106     EthernetProtocol ep;
00107     eh.GetSrcAddr(ea);
00108     eh.GetProtocolType(ep);
00109 
00110 
00111     if (ea!=MyEthernetAddr || (ep!=PROTO_ARP && ep!=PROTO_IP)) {
00112       cerr << "writer: discard packet with header=";
00113       cerr << eh;
00114       cerr <<" and length="<<p.size<<endl;
00115       continue;
00116     }
00117 
00118     cerr << "writer: launch packet "<<nout<< " with header "<<eh<<" and length="<<p.size<<endl;
00119 
00120 #if LIBNET11
00121   if (libnet_adv_write_link(interface,
00122                             (u_char *)(p.data),
00123                             p.size)<0) {
00124 #else
00125   if (libnet_write_link_layer(interface,
00126                               (const char *)device,
00127                               (u_char *)(p.data),
00128                               p.size)<0) {
00129 #endif
00130       cerr << "Can't write output packet "<<nout<<" to link\n";
00131       if (writeall(fileno(stdout),(char*)&fail,sizeof(fail),0,1)!=sizeof(fail)) {
00132         PERROR();
00133         return -1;
00134       }
00135       kill(ETHERNET_SIGNAL,getppid());
00136     } else {
00137       if (writeall(fileno(stdout),(char*)&ok,sizeof(ok),0,1)!=sizeof(ok)) {
00138         PERROR();
00139         return -1;
00140       }
00141       kill(ETHERNET_SIGNAL,getppid());
00142       nout++;
00143     }
00144 
00145 
00146 #else
00147     if ((len=readall(fileno(stdin),(char*)&(p.size),sizeof(p.size),1,0))<0) {
00148       if (errno==EWOULDBLOCK) {
00149         if (buffer.empty()) {
00150           /* Nothing to do.  poll on stdin until something happens */
00151           fprintf(stderr,"Nothing to do, waiting for input...");
00152           poll(&pfd,1,-1);
00153           fprintf(stderr,"OK\n");
00154           continue;
00155         } else {
00156           RawEthernetPacket p = buffer.front();
00157           buffer.pop_front();
00158           cerr << p;
00159 #if LIBNET11
00160           if (libnet_adv_write_link(interface,
00161                                     (u_char *)(p.data),
00162                                     p.size)<0) {
00163 #else
00164           if (libnet_write_link_layer(interface,
00165                                       (const char *)device,
00166                                       (u_char *)(p.data),
00167                                       p.size)<0) {
00168 #endif
00169             fprintf(stderr,"Can't write output packet %d to link\n",nout);
00170             if (writeall(fileno(stdout),(char*)&fail,sizeof(fail),0,1)!=sizeof(fail)) {
00171               PERROR();
00172               return -1;
00173             }
00174             kill(ETHERNET_SIGNAL,getppid());
00175           }
00176           if (writeall(fileno(stdout),(char*)&ok,sizeof(ok),0,1)!=sizeof(ok)) {
00177             PERROR();
00178             return -1;
00179           }
00180           kill(ETHERNET_SIGNAL,getppid());
00181           nout++;
00182         }
00183       } else {
00184         perror("Can't read packet length");
00185         exit(-1);
00186       }
00187     } else {
00188       assert(len==sizeof(int));
00189       len=readall(fileno(stdin),p.data,p.size,0,1);
00190       assert(len==p.size);
00191       fprintf(stderr,"writer: have input\n");
00192       buffer.push_back(p);
00193       nin++;
00194     }
00195 #endif
00196 
00197   }
00198 
00199 #if LIBNET11
00200   libnet_destroy(interface);
00201 #else
00202   libnet_close_link_interface(interface);
00203 #endif
00204 
00205 }
